```{r}
patients<-read.csv("表68.csv")
attach(patients)
glm.sol<-glm(Y~X1+X2+X3+X4+X5,family = binomial,data = patients)                                                      
summary(glm.sol)
pre1<-predict(glm.sol,data=patients)
p1<-exp(pre1)/(1+exp(pre1));p1
glm.new<-step(glm.sol)
summary(glm.new)
pre2<-predict(glm.new,data=patients)
p2<-exp(pre2)/(1+exp(pre2));p2
```
